actionTemplate.title: Fix brows that are too far apart
steps: Check brow-head spacing: roughly one eye width is a good reference
Shade slightly closer to the center with light strokes
Draw hair-like strokes following growth for a natural brow head
Keep brow head lighter; deepen the brow body gradually
Blend with a brush so the new brow head has no hard edge

rationaleTemplate: Bringing brow heads inward balances facial proportions
Soft strokes avoid a stamped, blocky brow head
